plot: While Derek does surveillance on a lawyer he suspects may be connected to Skynet, Sarah and Cameron begin to have doubts about Riley.

Cameron's glitch returns which she realizes that it could spell bad news for everyone. Sarah begins to investigate more into Riley and thinks John had told her about the apocalyptic future, which John denies, as does Cameron. Meanwhile, Derek begins tailing a powerful lawyer who may have a connection to Skynet with Jesse's help, but with nobody aware that she is behind all the mishaps that have been going on... and that Riley soon learns the real reason why Jesse recruited her.—matt-282

Riley is released from hospital after her suicide attempt and tries to resume her relationship with John. Sarah visits Riley's foster father and realizes that Riley knows about the apocalyptic future. John denies having told her anything. She subsequently meets Jesse - posing as a high school guidance counselor - and Sarah learns that Riley had accompanied John to Mexico. Cameron is having difficulty with her programing again and has developed a twitch in her left hand. Riley confronts Jesse when she finally realizes what Jesse's plan for her really is. Derek meanwhile is shadowing a lawyer who may have information for them.—garykmcd
